import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../App.css'; import { Menu, Grid, Image, Container, Header, Search, Icon, Table } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link, useRouteMatch, useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; const BuscarGrupos = () => { let user = localStorage.user, password = localStorage.pass; const usuario_admitido = [ 'F',1234]; const history = useHistory(); if (user != usuario_admitido[0] && password != usuario_admitido[1]) { history.push("/") }; const [ sesion_usuario, setSesion_usuario ] = useState(''); return (
Buscar Grupos
Grupos Encontrados Fisica110 Vectores 2 Horas Matematicas 120 Matrices 10 Minutos Matematica 110 Funciones 6 Horas E.Fisica II Rutinas 10 Horas Quimica Enlaces Quimicos 48 Minutos
); }; export default BuscarGrupos; ;
